title: Shattered Expectations
description: Seth HawkinsLead Guitarist, Secretive, UnforgivingThere was something about him that called to me. A darkness that drew me in. But he never noticed me. Until the night he did. One stolen night changed everything. One secret destroyed it all.Riley TemplePhotographer, Temptress, Off-LimitsShe distracted me from my nightmaresMade me feel normal, but it was all an act.An illusion destroyed by one single lieShattered by her truth, I walked away.I intended to have nothing more to do with her, but then she ran â€¦ She calls me Lucifer, and everybody knows The Devil always gets his due.
author: L. Ann
